"Nutrition is what you eat and drink. It's like fuel for your body. To stay healthy, you need a mix of different foods. These include fruits, vegetables, grains, proteins, and healthy fats. Each group has important nutrients your body needs. For example, fruits have vitamins and fiber, while proteins help build muscles. Balanced nutrition helps you grow, maintain energy, and fight diseases. Too much or too little of certain nutrients can harm your health. So, eat a variety of foods in the right amounts for good nutrition."

Nutrition is the process of providing food to your body. It needs energy and nutrients to stay healthy. Energy comes from food like carbohydrates, proteins, and fats. Nutrients include vitamins and minerals. They help your body grow, repair, and fight diseases. Good nutrition means eating a variety of foods every day. This ensures your body gets all the nutrients it needs.
